description:
A Qt/C++ GUI front end to sshfs, ecryptfs-simple, cryfs, gocryptfs, securefs, fscrypt and encfs


The signing key can be retrieved with below command:
    gpg --recv-keys 0x6855E493B5B2DF96E319BB6D16E2E1ACC6F51242
Note on Windows builds:
   SiriKaliQt5-1.8.2 builds are 32 bit and have minimum requirement of windows 7.
   SiriKaliQt6-1.8.2 builds are 64 bit and have minimum requirement of windows 10.
   Changelog:-
   [ALL]
-- Fix a build error when building with Qt >= 6.9.
-- Add UI config for 3 theme options and they are platform default, light theme and dark theme.
